name: Joey 3D: Corruption Class
description: Straight from the year 2015 comes the first game I've ever made: Joey 3D: Corruption Class! Play as the wacky dragon dude with an attitude Joey Fygoon on his quest to prevent an apocalypse initiated by the forces of Lord Barney and his army of bulldogs, malware, and other baddies! (AgentCubes is required to play.)
